name: Dreamlight
description:
Dreamlight is a 2D exploration sandbox with a survival aspects. This wonderful world provides you a huge variety of stuff to do such as:

  • Gather resources and make everything from scratch
    Who said what grass and rocks are useless?

  • Explore randomly generated worlds
    Dozens of different bioms will provide a unique experience each time you start

  • Develop your character
    Be it a sword fighting, magic or even eating. The more you do it, the better you do it!

  • Build
    Either you want to build a shelter or a marvelous structure, hundreds of different tiles will open the way for your creativity

  • Survive
    Stock up some food, fight challenging enemies and remember - fleeing is not a cowards way, it's a way to survive.
